name: Circulatory System
definition: System comprised of the heart and blood vessels that transports oxygen nutrients and hormones throughout the body and eliminates carbon dioxide and metabolic waste

name: Respiratory System
definition: System consisting of airways and lungs that facilitates gas exchange by delivering oxygen to blood and removing carbon dioxide from the body

name: Digestive System
definition: System of organs that mechanically and chemically breaks down food into absorbable nutrients for energy and eliminates waste products

name: Heart
definition: Muscular organ composed of four chambers that pumps blood through the circulatory system to deliver oxygen and nutrients throughout the body

name: Blood Vessels
definition: Network of tubes including arteries veins and capillaries that carry blood throughout the body

name: Right Atrium
definition: Upper right chamber of the heart that receives deoxygenated blood from the body via the vena cava

name: Left Ventricle
definition: Lower left chamber of the heart that pumps oxygenated blood to the body through the aorta with high pressure

name: Heart Valves
definition: Flap-like structures that open and close to ensure one-way blood flow through the heart chambers and prevent backflow

name: Tricuspid Valve
definition: Valve with three leaflets located between the right atrium and right ventricle that prevents backflow of blood into the right atrium

name: Aortic Valve
definition: Semilunar valve with three leaflets between the left ventricle and aorta that prevents backflow of blood from the aorta into the left ventricle

name: Arteries
definition: Blood vessels with thick muscular walls that carry oxygenated blood away from the heart to the body tissues under high pressure

name: Veins
definition: Blood vessels with thinner walls and valves that carry deoxygenated blood from body tissues back to the heart under low pressure

name: Aorta
definition: Largest artery in the body that carries oxygenated blood from the left ventricle to systemic circulation throughout the body

name: Coronary Arteries
definition: Arteries that branch from the aorta to supply oxygenated blood to the heart muscle itself

name: Vena Cava
definition: Largest veins in the body including superior and inferior vena cava that return deoxygenated blood from the body to the right atrium

name: Lungs
definition: Pair of spongy organs in the chest that facilitate gas exchange by absorbing oxygen and releasing carbon dioxide

name: Airways
definition: Passages including trachea bronchi and bronchioles that conduct air into and out of the lungs

name: Right Lung
definition: Larger lung with three lobes located on the right side of the chest cavity

name: Left Lung
definition: Smaller lung with two lobes located on the left side of the chest cavity to accommodate the heart

name: Upper Lobe
definition: Superior section of the right lung that performs gas exchange

name: Lower Lobe
definition: Inferior section of the right lung that performs gas exchange

name: Trachea
definition: Windpipe with cartilage rings that conducts air from the larynx to the bronchi

name: Bronchi
definition: Branching airways that extend from the trachea into each lung and further divide into smaller bronchioles

name: Primary Bronchi
definition: First major branches of the trachea that enter each lung carrying air to the right and left lungs

name: Mouth
definition: Oral cavity where food enters the body and mechanical digestion begins with chewing and saliva

name: Stomach
definition: Muscular organ that stores food and begins protein digestion using hydrochloric acid and enzymes

name: Small Intestine
definition: Long coiled tube where most chemical digestion and nutrient absorption occurs

name: Large Intestine
definition: Final section of digestive tract that absorbs water and electrolytes and forms feces for elimination

name: Duodenum
definition: First and shortest section of small intestine where most chemical digestion occurs using enzymes and bile

name: Ileum
definition: Final and longest section of small intestine that absorbs remaining nutrients and vitamin B12

name: Colon
definition: Main part of large intestine that absorbs water and forms solid waste for elimination

name: Rectum
definition: Final straight section of large intestine that stores feces before elimination through the anus

name: Ascending Colon
definition: Section of colon that travels upward on the right side of abdomen absorbing water

name: Sigmoid Colon
definition: S-shaped section of colon that connects to rectum and continues water absorption
